nodes.text: Ho'Din was the language of the Ho'Dins from the planet Moltok. Its spoken form included an amount of croaks and hisses.
Ho'Din in its written language included characters derived from the shapes of Moltok flora. Ho'Din lexicon includes a great amount of plant-based idioms and metaphors.
Ho'Din language is not particularly extended among non-Ho'Dins (not even among the Makurths).
